In a NutShell

What Am I ?

I can work in both front-end & back-end so i guess that's called (a Full-Stack Developer) . All my work until now was in small companies & start-ups in Egypt & the gulf area, So usually i had a lot of responsibilities :

  • I design HTML 5,CSS 3 websites or web APP (I'm a decent designer & I have Basic Photoshop skills)
  • Attach UI,UX in my work. (I use a lot of React.js & Angular.js)
  • Implement the APP on a server. (Often using PHP->Laravel OR ruby on rails. sometimes node->express.js). Then Setup the database usually Mysql, Mongodb, Mysqlite.
  • Create what ever needs to be done on the backend like CMS or Billing system or a White-Labeled App (what ever client needs)
  • Deploy the APP on external server or a cloud (had some expreince with that)
  • Setup automatic monitors, logs, backups
  • I can also create both Chrome APPs, Firefox Addons/Plugins & Opera Extensions.
  • I have a basic knowledge wiht SEO. I can create tools & applications that will cut your SEO guys time in half.
  • In a nutshell i can handle the whole web APP development cycle.

Why should you hire me ?

  • Over the time i acquired a unique ability to learn any technology fast & easily with or without an instructor. That made me highly adaptive to the work environment.
  • My greatest asset is I'm very very passionate about my work & I'm a fast self learner
  • I am a multi technology guy, by that i mean that i love programing in general, Not one technology of it, So expect me to learn new technologies every day.
  • I'm experienced in Executing/Programing all Websites Ideas with all it's forms & technologies
  • Had experience developing (Google Chrome Apps & Extensions) , (Firefox Addons) and (Opera Extensions)
  • I can develop management apps like apps for (restaurants - pharmacy - selling & buying systems - entrepreneur systems)
  • Had experience developing simple FaceBook apps that aims to increase your websites visitors
  • Had experience developing crawler-apps that extracts content from any website. (very helpful to populate a new website & increases website's visitors, it can extract thousands of posts into your website in minutes)
  • I have experience hosting websites via reseller accounts (very cheap hosting service)
  • Very good background in handling & creating APIs & resetful services
  • Had experience dealing with famous APIs & SDKs Like (Facebook SDK , twitter api , dropbox api , paypal api , stripe api , mailgun api)
  • I know the Basics about SEO and i build tools that helps you improve the websites ranking. also I can create facebook ads & google ads & monitor them. (I make marketing guys life easier by automating their work)
  • I'm good with java & can create simple apps with it (desktop APPs)
  • Currently Learning Android Development & can develop simple apps with it
  • I have both CCNA , CCNP Certifications from cisco, that improved me very very much in networking & dealing with them

What's my faults ?

  • I'm not a good speaker. Don't get me wrong I'm the guy you go to get things done. But I'm not the guy that will talk about it.
  • I get very nervous in interviews & similar events.
  • I'm a quite person, I have the (quite guy setting in the corner) personality.
  • I'm a decent designer but I don't like designing.
